item.description: It's suppose to be a beautiful day again Friday - close to 92 and sunny. Perfect weather for swimming or short walk around the pond. Look for myself near the changing room in the beach area in the shade. My cell is 508-472-7900. Bring snacks if you wish. I plan on being there for at least a couple of hours so come early or come late. It's $5 for parking or $35 for a season pass.
item.name: Walden Pond Swimming/walking/sunning
